synopsis.text: This thrilling anime unveils the secret life of students at Goryoukan Academy, a prestigious girls' high school with a clandestine mission. Unbeknownst to the outside world, the school serves as a training ground for the Fifth Force, an elite team of warriors tasked with battling the mysterious and malevolent Oburi, creatures from a rift in space-time. The only ones capable of combating these supernatural entities are the Strikers, young women with the unique ability to perceive the fifth dimension. As a new team leader assembles the five-member unit Altair Torte, the story of their battles and friendships unfolds, promising an action-packed and emotionally engaging adventure. Based on Square Enix's popular smartphone RPG, Schoolgirl Strikers, this anime is sure to captivate fans of the supernatural and action genres.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
